description.narrative: The purpose of the COVID-19 Emergency Response Project in Jordan is to prevent, detect and respond to the threat posed by COVID-19 (Coronavirus) and strengthen the national health system for public health preparedness. This project consists of three components. Component one aims to prevent and limit the spread of COVID-19 (Coronavirus) in Jordan. Component two will provide support for the International Coordination and Project Management Unit (ICPMU) at the Ministry of Health (MOH) in managing and overseeing project activities. Component three will contribute to providing immediate and effective response to said crisis or emergency.
